# clean file sheet of recruit data
```{r}
## OGS1
OGS1_re <- OGS1_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "_Y", minusX  = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## OGS2
OGS2_re <- OGS2_S3 %>%
  rename(X1="_X", Y1="_Y", minusX="_-X", minusY="_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
   select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SES1
SES1_re <- SES1_S3 %>%
  rename(X1="_X", Y1="_Y", minusX="_-X", minusY="_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
   select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SES2
SES2_re <- SES2_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SES3
SES3_re <- SES3_S2 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "_Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SES5
SES5_re <- SES5_S3 %>%
  rename(SX = "_X", 
         SY = "_Y",
         DBH = "DBH_Cen4", 
         Code = "Codes_Cen4", 
         HOM = "HOM_Cen4") %>%
  select(-Recorders)

## SIS1
SIS1_re <- SIS1_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SIS2
SIS2_re <- SIS2_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(minusY = as.numeric(minusY)) %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SIS3
SIS3_re <- SIS3_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SIS4
SIS4_re <- SIS4_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "_Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(Tag, c("Col","Tag"), sep="-", na.rm = TRUE, remove = T) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))

## SIS5
SIS5_re <- SIS5_S3 %>%
  rename(X1 = "_X", Y1 = "_Y", minusX = "_-X", minusY = "_-Y") %>%
  mutate(minusY = as.numeric(minusY)) %>%
  mutate(X2 = 5-minusX, Y2 = 5-minusY) %>%
  unite(SX, c("X1","X2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(SY, c("Y1","Y2"), na.rm = TRUE, remove = FALSE) %>%
  unite(Tag, c("Col","Tag"), sep="-", na.rm = TRUE, remove = T) %>%
  select(-c("X1","minusX","Y1","minusY","X2","Y2","Recorders"))


# rename column name 
dataset1_re <- rbind(OGS1_re, OGS2_re, SES1_re, SES2_re, SES3_re, SIS1_re, SIS2_re, SIS3_re) 
dataset1_re <- dataset1_re %>%
  rename(DBH = "DBH_Cen3", 
         Code = "Codes_Cen3", 
         HOM = "HOM_Cen3")

dataset2_re <- rbind(SIS4_re, SIS5_re)
dataset2_re <- dataset2_re %>%
  rename(DBH = "DBH_Cen2", 
         Code = "Codes_Cen2", 
         HOM = "HOM_Cen2")

# combine recruit of all plot 
combine_recruit <- rbind(dataset1_re, dataset2_re, SES5_re) 
combine_recruit$ExactDate <- convertToDate(combine_recruit$ExactDate)

Cen_recruit <- combine_recruit %>%
  mutate_at(c("Census","StemTag","Quadrat","SX","SY","DBH","HOM"), as.numeric)

```

# clean file sheet of OldTree and AddStem
```{r}
## OGS1
OGS1_oldTrees <- OGS1_S1 %>%
  select(-(DBH_Cen2:Codes_Cen2)) 

OGS1_combine <- rbind(OGS1_oldTrees, OGS1_S2) %>%
  select(-Recorders)

  
## OGS2
OGS2_combine <- OGS2_S1 %>%
  mutate(Tree_Id = as.character(Tree_Id)) %>%
  unite(Remarks, c("Remarks_III","Tree_Id_corrected"),sep = ";ID", na.rm = TRUE, remove = F) %>% 
  select(Census:Plot, Quad:QY, Dbh_aIII:Date_III, -Remarks_III) %>%
  rename("1" = Dbh_aIII,
         "2" = Dbh_bIII,
         "3" = Dbh_cIII,
         "4" = Dbh_dIII,
         "5" = Dbh_eIII,
         "6" = Dbh_fIII,
         "7" = Dbh_gIII,
         "8" = Dbh_hIII,
         "9" = Dbh_iIII,
         Tag = Tree_Id,
         GenusSpecies = Latest.name,
         Quadrat = Quad,
         Qx =QX,
         Qy =QY,
         Codes_Cen3 = Codes_III,
         HOM_Cen3 = HOM_III,
         ExactDate = Date_III) %>%
  mutate_at(c(9:17), as.numeric, na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  pivot_longer(c(9:17),
               names_to = "StemTag",
               values_to = "DBH_Cen3") %>%
  filter(DBH_Cen3!="NA")

## SES1
SES1_oldTrees <- SES1_S1 %>%
  select(-(DBH_Cen2:Codes_Cen2)) 

SES1_combine <- rbind(SES1_oldTrees, SES1_S2) %>%
  select(-Recorders)

## SES2
SES2_oldTrees <- SES2_S1 %>%
  select(-(DBH_Cen2:Codes_Cen2))

SES2_combine <- rbind(SES2_oldTrees, SES2_S2) %>%
  select(-Recorders)

## SES3
SES3_combine <- SES3_S1 %>%
  mutate(Tree_Id = as.character(Tree_Id)) %>%
  select(Census:QY, Dbh_aIII:Date) %>%
  rename("1" = Dbh_aIII,
         "2" = Dbh_bIII,
         "3" = Dbh_cIII,
         "4" = Dbh_dIII,
         "5" = Dbh_eIII,
         "6" = Dbh_fIII,
         "7" = Dbh_gIII,
         "8" = Dbh_hIII,
         Tag = Tree_Id,
         GenusSpecies = Latest.name,
         Quadrat = Quad,
         Qx = QX,
         Qy = QY,
         Codes_Cen3 = Codes,
         HOM_Cen3 = HOM,
         ExactDate = Date) %>%
    mutate_at(c(9:16), as.numeric, na.rm = TRUE) %>%
    pivot_longer(c(9:16),
               names_to = "StemTag",
               values_to = "DBH_Cen3") %>%
  filter(DBH_Cen3!="NA")

## SES5
SES2_oldTrees <- SES5_S1 %>%
  select(-(DBH_Cen2:Codes_Cen2))

SES2_combine <- rbind(SES2_oldTrees, SES2_S2) %>%
  select(-Recorders)


## SIS1
SIS1_oldTrees <- SIS1_S1 %>%
  select(-(DBH_Cen2:Codes_Cen2)) %>%
  rename(Tag_correct = Tag_corrected)

SIS1_combine <- rbind(SIS1_oldTrees, SIS1_S2) %>%
  unite(Remarks, c("Remarks","Tag_correct"), sep = "; TreeID", na.rm = TRUE, remove = T) %>%
  select(-Recorders) 



CensusSmallPlot_combine <- rbind(OGS1_combine, OGS2_combine, SES1_combine, SES2_combine, SES3_combine,
                                 SIS1_combine)




```
